about_the_game:
Immerse Yourself in the Ultimate Parkour Experience

Dive into a vibrant cityscape where the only limits are your imagination and skill. Set against the backdrop of a sprawling modern metropolis, this first-person parkour game places you high above the streets, navigating across buildings and intricate rooftop networks. In single-player time trials, you’ll be met with challenges that require you to execute flawless parkour sequences, breaking falls to daring leaps between buildings, all while racing against the clock.

Pure First-Person Parkour Adventure Awaits


Relive the thrill of first-person parkour with a game that honors the simplicity of classic gaming. The game is designed for those who value a straightforward and engaging experience:

  • No Microtransactions – Access the entire game without extra costs or in-game purchases.
  • No Lootboxes – All content is available through gameplay, not random chance.
  • No Skins – Stay focused on the action, without the distraction of cosmetic changes.
  • No Heroes or Zombies – Focus solely on parkour action without unnecessary distractions.
  • No Forced Online Services – Play offline at your convenience, without mandatory internet access.

As a devoted single-player enthusiast, I created this game to ensure you can enjoy pure, straightforward fun without modern gaming nuisances.

name: Like Birds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Needs more data
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5600x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3600ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game was developed using this setup

short_description: Like Birds is a Singleplayer-parkour game that removed all of the unwanted features of modern titles. No microtransactions, no lootboxes, etc. Set in the modern era, jump gaps and vault over obstacles.
